info.title: DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Analytics catalog client.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The Azure Data Lake Analytics account upon which to execute catalog operations.

get.description: Gets the specified secret in the specified database. This is deprecated and will be removed in the next release. Please use GetCredential instead.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database containing the secret.

parameters.name: secretName
parameters.description: The name of the secret to get

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of the specified secret in the specified database.

password.description: the password for the secret to pass in

uri.description: the URI identifier for the secret in the format <hostname>:<port>

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogSecretCreateOrUp.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog secret creation and update parameters. This is deprecated and will be removed in the next release. Please use DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialCreateOrUpdateParameters instead.

password.description: the password for the credential and user with access to the data source.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the data source this credential can connect to in the format <hostname>:<port>

userId.description: the object identifier for the user associated with this credential with access to the data source.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialCreate.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential creation parameters.

password.description: the current password for the credential and user with access to the data source. This is required if the requester is not the account owner.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialDelete.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential deletion parameters.

password.description: the current password for the credential and user with access to the data source. This is required if the requester is not the account owner.

newPassword.description: the new password for the credential and user with access to the data source.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the data source this credential can connect to in the format <hostname>:<port>

userId.description: the object identifier for the user associated with this credential with access to the data source.

DataLakeAnalyticsCatalogCredentialUpdate.description: Data Lake Analytics catalog credential update parameters.

creationTime.description: the creation time of the credential object. This is the only information returned about a secret from a GET.

uri.description: the URI identifier for the secret in the format <hostname>:<port>

password.description: the password for the secret to pass in

USqlSecret.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL secret item.

externalDataSourceName.description: the name of the external data source.

provider.description: the name of the provider for the external data source.

providerString.description: the name of the provider string for the external data source.

pushdownTypes.description: the list of types to push down from the external data source.

USqlExternalDataSource.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL external datasource item.

value.description: the list of external data sources in the database

USqlExternalDataSourceList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL external datasource item list.

value.description: the list of credentials in the database

USqlCredentialList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL credential item list.

USqlCredential.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL credential item.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this procedure and database.

definition.description: the defined query of the procedure.

USqlProcedure.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL procedure item.

value.description: the list of procedure in the database and schema combination

USqlProcedureList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL procedure item list.

name.description: the name of the column in the table.

type.description: the object type of the specified column (such as System.String).

USqlTableColumn.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table column item.

name.description: the name of the index in the table.

descending.description: the switch indicating if the index is descending or not.

USqlDirectedColumn.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL directed column item.

keys.description: the list of directed columns in the distribution

count.description: the count of indices using this distribution.

dynamicCount.description: the dynamic count of indices using this distribution.

USqlDistributionInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL distribution information object.

name.description: the name of the index in the table.

indexKeys.description: the list of directed columns in the index

columns.description: the list of columns in the index

distributionInfo.description: the distributions info of the index

partitionFunction.description: partition function ID for the index.

partitionKeyList.description: the list of partion keys in the index

streamNames.description: the list of full paths to the streams that contain this index in the DataLake account.

isColumnstore.description: the switch indicating if this index is a columnstore index.

indexId.description: the ID of this index within the table.

isUnique.description: the switch indicating if this index is a unique index.

USqlIndex.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table index item.

firstPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

secondPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

thirdPart.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

server.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

DdlName.description: A Data Lake Analytics DDL name item.

name.description: the name of the external table associated with this database, schema and table.

version.description: the version of the external data source.

EntityId.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog entity identifier object.

tableName.description: the name of the table associated with this database and schema.

dataSource.description: the data source associated with this external table.

ExternalTable.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog external table item.

name.description: the name of the field associated with this type.

TypeFieldInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog type field information item.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this table and database.

columnList.description: the list of columns in this table

indexList.description: the list of indices in this table

partitionKeyList.description: the list of partition keys in the table

externalTable.description: the external table associated with the table.

distributionInfo.description: the distributions info of the table

USqlTable.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table item.

value.description: the list of tables in the database and schema combination

USqlTableList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table item list.

columns.description: the type field information associated with this table type.

USqlTableType.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table type item.

value.description: the list of table types in the database and schema combination

USqlTableTypeList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table type item list.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this view and database.

definition.description: the defined query of the view.

USqlView.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL view item.

value.description: the list of view in the database and schema combination

USqlViewList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL view item list.

databaseName.description: the name of the database containing the package.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this package and database.

USqlPackage.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL package item.

value.description: the list of packages in the database and schema combination

USqlPackageList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL package item list.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this table partition and database.

partitionName.description: the name of the table partition.

parentName.description: the Ddl object of the partition's parent.

indexId.description: the index ID for this partition.

label.description: the list of labels associated with this partition.

createDate.description: the creation time of the partition

USqlTablePartition.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table partition item.

value.description: the list of table partitions in the database, schema and table combination

USqlTablePartitionList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table partition item list.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this table and database.

statisticsName.description: the name of the table statistics.

userStatName.description: the name of the user statistics.

statDataPath.description: the path to the statistics data.

createTime.description: the creation time of the statistics.

updateTime.description: the last time the statistics were updated.

isUserCreated.description: the switch indicating if these statistics are user created.

isAutoCreated.description: the switch indicating if these statistics are automatically created.

hasFilter.description: the switch indicating if these statistics have a filter.

filterDefinition.description: the filter definition for the statistics.

colNames.description: the list of column names associated with these statistics.

USqlTableStatistics.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table statistics item.

value.description: the list of table statistics in the database, schema and table combination

USqlTableStatisticsList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table statistics item list.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this table and database.

typeName.description: the name of type for this type.

typeFamily.description: the type family for this type.

cSharpName.description: the C# name for this type.

fullCSharpName.description: the fully qualified C# name for this type.

systemTypeId.description: the system type ID for this type.

userTypeId.description: the user type ID for this type.

schemaId.description: the schema ID for this type.

principalId.description: the principal ID for this type.

isNullable.description: the the switch indicating if this type is nullable.

isUserDefined.description: the the switch indicating if this type is user defined.

isAssemblyType.description: the the switch indicating if this type is an assembly type.

isTableType.description: the the switch indicating if this type is a table type.

isComplexType.description: the the switch indicating if this type is a complex type.

USqlType.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL type item.

value.description: the list of types in the database and schema combination

USqlTypeList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL type item list.

schemaName.description: the name of the schema associated with this database.

tvfName.description: the name of the table valued function.

definition.description: the definition of the table valued function.

USqlTableValuedFunction.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table valued function item.

value.description: the list of table valued functions in the database and schema combination

USqlTableValuedFunctionList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL table valued function item list.

originalPath.description: the the original path to the assembly file.

contentPath.description: the the content path to the assembly file.

USqlAssemblyFileInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL assembly file information item.

USqlAssemblyDependencyInfo.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL dependency information item.

isVisible.description: the switch indicating if this assembly is visible or not.

isUserDefined.description: the switch indicating if this assembly is user defined or not.

files.description: the list of files associated with the assembly

dependencies.description: the list of dependencies associated with the assembly

USqlAssembly.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL Assembly.

USqlAssemblyClr.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL assembly CLR item.

value.description: the list of assemblies in the database

USqlAssemblyList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL assembly CLR item list.

USqlSchema.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL schema item.

value.description: the list of schemas in the database

USqlSchemaList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL schema item list.

USqlDatabase.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL database item.

USqlDatabaseList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog U-SQL database item list.

computeAccountName.description: the name of the Data Lake Analytics account.

version.description: the version of the catalog item.

CatalogItem.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog item.

nextLink.description: the link to the next page of results.

CatalogItemList.description: A Data Lake Analytics catalog item list.

adlaCatalogDnsSuffixInPath.name: adlaCatalogDnsSuffix
adlaCatalogDnsSuffixInPath.description: Gets the DNS suffix used as the base for all Azure Data Lake Analytics Catalog service requests.
